name: @packlet/build
description: Packlet build wrapper: build ESM, d.ts, and CJS (opt-in) for packages and expose programmatic API.

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outfile=dist/index.mjs --format=esm --target=node --minify && bun build src/cli.ts --outfile=dist/cli.mjs --format=esm --target=node --minify && bun x tsc -p tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist && (test -f dist/.tsbuildinfo && mv dist/.tsbuildinfo .tsbuildinfo || true) && chmod +x dist/cli.mjs
